Method Detail

blockUntil

public final void blockUntil(String barrierName,
                             int expectedMembers)
                      throws Exception
Blocks the thread execution until nodes has reached this

Parameters:
barrierName - the barrier name
expectedMembers - the number of expected members
Throws:
Exception - if this node has failed to send the barrier synchronization message or it was interrupted while waiting

shutdown

public final void shutdown()
shutdowns this barrier
